root.name: Jelly Car
root.description: The object of Jelly Car is to drive your car, which has jelly like properties, around different obstacles to reach the end of the level. The car can increase in size to get over large gaps, decrease in size to squeeze through tight spaces, flip, rotate, and morph in all sorts of contortions. Jelly Car was later ported to the iPhone app platform where it won Best Kids Game in the 2008 Best App Ever awards.
